backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user win counts with functions to record wins, fetch a sorted leaderboard, and get individual win totals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, hooks, styles, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React game component handling Tic-Tac-Toe logic, AI timing, audio, username integration, and leaderboard updates.
frontend/src/components/AISpeedControl.t: UI card with buttons allowing users to select AI speed mode with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: Displays the leaderboard with medals, refresh controls, loading states, and styled score rows.
frontend/src/components/UsernameForm.tsx: Player profile form allowing username entry with validation and a save action showing success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor using the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAISpeed.ts: Hook managing AI speed setting with localStorage persistence and derived delay/timing values.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and context initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Fetches and sorts leaderboard scores and provides a mutation to record wins using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing; queries are handled in feature‑specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Preloads audio effects and exposes a play function for game sounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsername.ts: Manages a username stored in localStorage with validation and update helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables including neon color utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tictactoe.ts: Implements Tic‑Tac‑Toe logic including winner checks, AI minimax with memoization, and move evaluation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, utilities, and animations using custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the current state of a Neon Tic‑Tac‑Toe DApp project, including features implemented, known issues, and architectural notes. Primarily tracks gameplay, UI, AI, and leaderboard requirements for build planning.
